definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge

sentences.english: Strict glycemic control is extremely important for the prevention of diabetic complications.
sentences.chinese: 严格控制血糖对于糖尿病合并症的预防极为重要。

sentences.english: Complications are rare, however, they can occur.
sentences.chinese: 检查带来的合并症虽然非常少见，但还是可能发生的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate diagnosis and treatment of scalp hematomas and complications in infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨小婴儿头皮血肿及合并症的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: The aim of the present study was to evaluate their psychiatric comorbidity.
sentences.chinese: 本研究的目的是评价他们的精神合并症。

sentences.english: As is the case for any surgery, there is a small risk of complications.
sentences.chinese: 象这些患者做任何手术一样，都有合并症的小风险。

sentences.english: other less common complications may also occur.
sentences.chinese: 其他不太常见的合并症也有可能会发生。

sentences.english: The main complication and the major causes of death were infection.
sentences.chinese: 感染是主要的合并症和死亡原因。

sentences.english: Among the 75 old patients, 63 have complication.
sentences.chinese: 结果本组75例老年患者中63例有合并症。

sentences.english: Sternal fistulae are a seldom event after cardiac surgery.
sentences.chinese: 胸骨虞廔管是心脏手术之后罕见的合并症。

sentences.english: Significant comorbidity such as ischemic heart disease and stroke subtracts 2 points.
sentences.chinese: 像缺血性心脏病和中风等明显合并症者也要减去2分。

sentences.english: Overall, the benefits of amblyopia treatment occurred with a low chance of complications, according to Dr. Repka.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说合并症越多的患者治疗效果越差。

sentences.english: The patients with spastic quadriplegia of CP have the most complication.
sentences.chinese: 痉挛型四肢瘫合并症最多。
